main event: An unidentified flying object was reported over Far Rockaway, New York on 11 August 1965.
interesting points: The object was described as elliptical in shape and extremely bright, emitting a white-blue light., The observation lasted for only 1 second., The object exhibited characteristics greater than the surrounding stars., The observers noted that the object was glistening and maneuverable with varying altitudes., A letter from the USAF indicated that the object was not a meteor.
